metadata.dcterms:title: Alberta Survey, 2015B
metadata.dcterms:creator: Population Research Laboratory
metadata.dcterms:description: The Population Research Laboratory (PRL) administered the 2015 Alberta Survey B. This survey of households across the province of Alberta continues to enable academic researchers, government departments, and non-profit organizations to explore a wide range of topics in a structured research framework and environment. Sponsorsâ€™ research questions are asked together with demographic questions in a telephone interview of Alberta households.
